Title: Chief Technology Officer
Headline: SanDisk Appoints Yoram Cedar To Newly Formed Position Of EVP And Chief Technology Officer
The full text of the press release:
SanDisk Appoints Yoram Cedar To Newly Formed Position Of EVP And Chief Technology Officer
Date: 7 October 2010 (RTTNews) - SanDisk Corp. (SNDK) appointed Yoram Cedar to the newly formed position of Executive Vice President and Chief Technology Officer effective immediately. This new role will be responsible for developing and driving the Company's technology roadmap.
Cedar will have responsibility for leading technical resources in the existing Technology; Corporate Engineering and Fab Operations and Solid State Drive groups as well as developing emerging technologies and new product architectures.
Since January 2009; Cedar has served as the SanDisk's Executive Vice President; OEM Business and Corporate Engineering. Previously; he served as Executive Vice President and General Manager of Mobile and Corporate Engineering.
Effective upon his appointment; Cedar's annual base salary will be $475;000. Cedar's target bonus remains 90% of his base salary.
What Happened: Sandisk promoted Yoram Cedar to Chief Technology Officer
About Person: Yoram Cedar was previously the Executive Vice President; OEM Business and Corporate Engineering at SanDisk.
About Company: SanDisk Corporation is the global leader in flash memory cards; from research; manufacturing and product design to consumer branding and retail distribution. SanDisk’s product portfolio includes flash memory cards for mobile phones; digital cameras and camcorders; digital audio/video players.
